channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: サン・クエンティン刑務所内の収監ジャーナリストが、報復や検閲に直面しながらも、獄中生活についてのポッドキャストを作り、賞を獲得している（Sam Levin/The Guardian）
item.description:
Sam Levin / The Guardian:
How incarcerated journalists inside San Quentin prison are making podcasts about life behind bars and winning awards, despite facing retaliation and censorship  —  Inside San Quentin, residents are drawing mainstream audiences and shifting narratives about life behind bars

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙のゲーム専門紙「Launcher」の事後調査：20人のスタッフ解雇、リソース不足、ゲームメディアに対する幹部の過小評価など（Mikhail Klimentov/ReaderGrev）
item.description:
Mikhail Klimentov / ReaderGrev:
A postmortem of The Washington Post's Launcher gaming vertical: 20 staff laid off, a lack of resources, executives' under appreciation of gaming media, and more  —  Why did The Washington Post kill its video game vertical? … November would have marked my four-year anniversary at Launcher …

item.title: NewsGuard：2023年5月以降、AIが作成した偽記事をホストするウェブサイトは49から600以上に増加、1日に「数千とは言わないまでも数百の記事」を生成するものもある（Pranshu Verma/Washington Post）
item.description:
Pranshu Verma / Washington Post:
NewsGuard: since May 2023, websites hosting AI-created false articles have grown from 49 to 600+; some generate “hundreds if not thousands of articles” per day  —  AI is making it easy for anyone to create propaganda outlets, producing content that can be hard to differentiate from real news

item.title: ソニーは、100億ドルの合併計画を救済するためにジー社からの提案を聞きたいと言っており、12月21日の期限延長を求めるジー社の要求にはまだ同意していない（Sanjai P R/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Sanjai P R / Bloomberg:
Sony says it's looking to hear proposals from Zee to rescue the $10B merger plan and has not yet agreed to Zee's request to extend the December 21 deadline  —  - Wants to see Zee's deal rescue plans as Dec. 21 deadline looms  — Both signed a pact in 2021 to create a $10 billion media giant

item.title: 情報筋アピンの共同創業者ラジャト・カレは、法律事務所を使って米国、英国、スイス、インド、ルクセンブルクの報道機関を脅し、ハック・フォー・ハイヤー業界に関する記事を抹消させた（Lachlan Cartwright/The Daily Beast）。

item.title: MGM+はライオンズゲートとライセンス契約を結び、国際展開の一環として1月からブラジルとメキシコを皮切りにラテンアメリカに進出する（Elsa Keslassy/Variety）
item.description:
Elsa Keslassy / Variety:
MGM+ partners with Lionsgate on a licensing deal to expand into Latin America as part of its international rollout, starting with Brazil and Mexico in January  —  Under the pact, the MGM+ offer will boast leading series and movies from Lionsgate and Starz, alongside iconic films …

item.title: 情報源：英国の労働党は、選挙前にルパート・マードックのような右翼メディアオーナーに求愛するため、報道規制を弱める計画に反対しない（ガーディアン紙）。
item.description:
The Guardian:
Sources: the UK's Labour party won't oppose plans to weaken press regulation as its leaders court rightwing media owners like Rupert Murdoch before the election  —  The party has made it clear that Keir Starmer had no intention of reviving the second stage of the Leveson inquiry

item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
WWD names Eugenia Miranda Richman as its EIC, effective January 26, reporting to Fairchild Editorial Director Jim Fallon; Richman was previously SheKnows' EIC  —  In her new role, Richman will oversee the editorial team in the development of its breaking news and business content and guide …

item.title: TikTokがタブレットと折りたたみ可能なデバイス向けにアプリをアップデート、合理化されたナビゲーションバーとランドスケープモードを追加し、YouTubeに対抗しようとしている（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
TikTok updates its app for tablets and foldable devices, adding streamlined navigation bars and a landscape mode, as the company seeks to compete with YouTube  —  TikTok has rolled out an update to enhance the app experience for viewers on tablets and foldable devices, the company announced on Monday.

item.title: 情報筋AmazonがDiamond Sports Groupと投資と複数年のストリーミング提携について交渉中、Diamondはケーブルネットワークの運営を継続（Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Amazon is in talks with Diamond Sports Group about an investment and a multiyear streaming partnership; Diamond would keep operating its cable networks  —  E-commerce giant would partner with Diamond on streaming as part of deal under discussion  —  Amazon is in talks to invest …

item.title: ドキュメントTikTokは60以上のAmazon関連アカウントにフラグを立てないよう一部のモデレーターに伝えた。
item.description:
The Guardian:
Docs: TikTok told some moderators not to flag 60+ Amazon-related accounts because Amazon is a heavy advertiser; Amazon is on a “protected list” of companies  —  Exclusive: Internal communications suggest video platform working to protect its lucrative relationship with e-commerce firm

item.title: FlipboardはActivityPubとの完全統合を計画しており、Semafor、Medium、Polygon、Kotaku、Digiday、The Vergeなど一部のアカウントでテストを行っている（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Flipboard plans to fully integrate with ActivityPub and is testing the move with select accounts, like Semafor, Medium, Polygon, Kotaku, Digiday, and The Verge  —  Instagram Threads isn't the only app joining the decentralized social web, which includes Twitter/X rival Mastodon and other apps …

Sources: The Messenger editors clashed with publisher Jimmy Finkelstein in November after a directive to remove Donald Trump “trial coverage” from the homepage  —  The Scoop  —  During former President Donald Trump's civil fraud trial in New York last month …

item.title: ニュースクエストの編集AI責任者ジョディ・ドハティ＝コーブによると、英国の地方出版社は現在7人のAIアシスト記者を雇用し、「数千の記事」を発行している（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Newsquest's head of editorial AI, Jody Doherty-Cove, says the UK regional publisher now employs seven AI-assisted reporters publishing “thousands of articles”  —  The company's head of editorial AI said it had published “thousands” of AI-assisted articles.
